summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: I Love Lucy: Season 1
Review Date: 2022/05/02
Store: Lucille Ball  (Actor),     Desi Arnaz  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Paramount Home Entertainment, Boxed Sets
Product Description: ["Here's how it all began-the classic episodes that started America's long-running love affair with everyone's favorite madcap redhead, Lucille Ball. Plus the rarely seen pilot episode that sold the I LOVE LUCY series. By the end of it's initial season, I LOVE LUCY was TV's first bona fide smash-hit-the very first program seen in more than 10 million homes."]
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Comedy/Television, Television', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Black & White, Closed-captioned, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled, Dubbed', 'Contributor': 'Vivian Vance, Desi Arnaz, William Frawley, Lucille Ball', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '6', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 6.08 Ounces', 'Audio Description': 'English', 'Item model number': '25631193', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Box set, Black & White, Closed-captioned, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled, Dubbed', 'Run time': '15 hours and 21 minutes', 'Release date': 'December 19, 2017', 'Actors': 'Lucille Ball, Desi Arnaz, Vivian Vance, William Frawley', 'Dubbed': 'Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish', 'Studio': 'Paramount Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '6'}
Review Text: Just started watching this dvd.  I love "I Love Lucy" I could watch it 100 times, if I haven't already in my lifetime, and still laugh like it is the first time.  On my Samsung HD TV, this picture is absolutely beautiful, better then when it is shown on cable tv!!!!! It is so clear and so 3d looking!!! What a good deal this was for the whole season!! I already have season 2 so I just ordered 3 through 6 and can't wait to watch them all!!!
Review Title: 5 ***** stars!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: It Was Always You
Review Date: 2022/05/06
Store: Michael Robison  (Director),     Erin Krakow  (Actor),     Tyler Hynes  (Actor)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Drama
Product Description: ["Elizabeth's engagement plans are thrown into disarray when her fiancée's free-spirited brother David returns home. David's unexpected influence prompts Elizabeth to question her life decisions."]
Average Rating: 4.9
Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 5.35 x 0.55 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Director': 'Michael Robison', 'Media Format': 'NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '1 hour and 24 minutes', 'Release date': 'August 3, 2021', 'Actors': 'Erin Krakow, Tyler Hynes', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Studio': 'Hallmark', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: I have seen this moving numerous times and every time I feel like it is the first time watching it.  Tyler and Erin are such a perfect match for each other, they have chemistry, and I think this is one of the best movies that I have ever watched! To the person who gave it one star, and it was a male, your review was very unfair and cruel for this movie. Give it to goodwill, who cares.  If you think it was so horrible, then why did you even buy it, you probably didn't even read the description of the movie. Shame on you. To anyone else, this movie is fantastic and a perfect Hallmark movie.
Review Title: I love this movie!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Product Title: I Love Lucy: Season 3
Review Date: 2022/06/02
Store: Desi Arnaz  (Actor),     Vivian Vance  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Paramount Home Entertainment, Boxed Sets
Product Description: ["Cuban-born bandleader Ricky Ricardo, and his wife, Lucy, live in a Brownstone apartment building on East 68th Street in New York City. The beautiful but daffy Lucy has the nasty habit of getting into jams, scrapes, and predicaments of all kinds. The Ricardo's' best friends and landlords, Fred and Ethel Mertz, frequently find themselves in the middle of Lucy's outlandish escapades."]

Product Title: Dirty Dancing: 30th Anniversary [DVD]
Review Date: 2022/09/03
Store: Jennifer Grey  (Actor),     Patrick Swayze  (Actor),     Emile Ardolino  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Drama
Product Description: ['Product Description', "Its the summer of 1963 and Baby is stuck at the Catskills with her parents. Attempting to make the best of the situation, Baby attends the organized classes on merengue dancing and wig demonstration. Suddenly, all of that changes when she meets Johnny Castle, the resort's dance instructor. With Johnny, Baby learns the steps to a new dance--a dirty dance--that allows her to discover new strengths and new talents in order to define her place in a rapidly changing world. Under the influence of Rhythm and Blues, Baby can now express herself and her love for Johnny.", 'Review', 'NEVER-BEFORE-SEEN Happy Birthday, DIRTY DANCINGNEVER-BEFORE-SEEN Patrick Swayze: In His Own WordsNEVER-BEFORE-SEEN Patrick Swayze UncutNEVER-BEFORE-SEEN Eleanor Bergstein Thoughts On A Lifetime Of DIRTY DANCINGOuttakes/ deleted/ alternate/ extended scenesMusic VideosThe DIRTY DANCING PhenomenonThe Rhythm Of The DancingOriginal Screen TestsCast & Crew Interviews (Jennifer Grey, Eleanor Bergstein, Miranda Garrison, Kenny Ortega)Commentary with Writer/ Co-Producer Eleanor BergsteinCommentary with Kenny Ortega, Miranda Garrison, Jeff Jur, Hilary Rosenfeld and David Chapman --Lionsgate']

Product Title: Merry & Bright
Review Date: 2022/09/03
Store: Sweetin, Jodie  (Actor),     Walker, Andrew  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Drama
Product Description: ["Cate (Jodie Sweetin) is the CEO of the Merry & Bright Candy Cane Company. During the busy Christmas season, Cate meets Gabe (Andrew Walker), who she assumes is the suitor her well-meaning mother is trying to set her up with. In reality, Gabe works for Empire Corporate Recovery. He has been hired by the board to take a closer look at Merry & Bright's operation and find ways to make the company more profitable. As Cate and Gabe work together, they find ways to elevate the business and discover that they have more in common than savvy business sense."]

Product Title: The Love Boat: Season 2, Vol. 2
Review Date: 2022/09/03
Store: Fred Grandy  (Actor),     Bernie Kopell  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Paramount Home Entertainment, Comedy
Product Description: ["Take a voyage to romance aboard this ocean liner that whisks it's passengers-and surprising guest stars-on panoramic journeys that lead to love. Playing tour guide and matchmaker are the Pacific Princess's trusty crew, including cruise director Julie (Lauren Tewes), yeoman Gopher (Fred Grandy), ship's doctor Adam Bricker (Bernie Kopell), drink-slinger Isaac (Ted Lange), and, of course, Captain Merrill Stubing (Gavin MacLeod). Amid luxurious surroundings and the tempestuous heat of the tropics, anything can happen in this show that is by turns heartwarming, sentimental, and slapstick-funny. With several storylines per episode, this escapist gem offers a garden of delights for the romantic at heart. This collection presents the second volume of episodes from the series' second season."]

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual's purchase history indicates a strong preference for classic television shows and romantic movies, particularly those with a nostalgic charm, as evidenced by the multiple purchases of complete seasons of a beloved sitcom and Hallmark films. Consistently high ratings reflect satisfaction with both visual quality and storytelling, with specific sentiments highlighting emotional resonance and the ability to enjoy these media repeatedly.

Common themes include a love for comedy and heartwarming narratives that often evoke a sense of nostalgia or comfort. The focus is largely on feel-good entertainment, suggesting a desire for escapism and joy in leisure time. 

Quality expectations lean towards clear picture clarity and comprehensive collections, underscoring a preference for high-quality formats and complete sets, while the choice of DVDs indicates some price sensitivity, favoring bundled deals that offer good value. The individual appears undeterred by budget constraints when it comes to emotionally appealing content, emphasizing the significance of enjoyment over price in purchasing decisions. Overall, the core preference is for collectible, classic content that provides joy and nostalgia, particularly in the comedy and romance genres.

target_interaction.title: 5 ***** stars!!
target_interaction.text: Love this tv series! Brings back so many memories. If only life was this simple and laid back nowadays!
description: Take a voyage to romance aboard this ocean liner that whisks it's passengers, and surprising guest stars, on panoramic journeys that lead to love. Playing tour guide and matchmaker are the Pacific Princess' trusty crew, including cruise director Julie (Lauren Tewes), yeoman Gopher (Fred Grandy), ship's doctor Adam Bricker (Bernie Kopell), drink slinger Isaac (Ted Lange), and, of course, Captain Merrill Stubing (Gavin MacLeod). Amid luxurious surroundings, and the tempestuous heat of the tropics, anything can happen in this show that is by turns heartwarming, sentimental, and slapstick funny. With several storylines per episode, this escapist gem offers a garden of delights for the romantic at heart. This collection presents the first batch of episodes from the series' second season. Starring Gavin MacLeod, Ted Lange, Lauren Tewes, Bernie Kopell, Fred Grandy Special Features: Sensormatic Package Note: Multi-Disc Set Full Frame - 1.33 Audio: (unspecified) English.
cruised into its second season as one of television's top 20 shows and guiltiest of pleasures. Leaving uncharted waters to edgier shows of the day,

was pure escapist entertainment. Each of these 13 episodes steers a tried and true course through three stories; one involving the crew members, another played for laughs, and the other more dramatic, but with a reassuring finish that allowed everyone to disembark with hope of a happy-ever-after. Each episode, too, is a minor miracle of casting with a star-studded roster ranging from seasoned Hollywood veterans to fresh faces just finding their sea legs. Vincent Price is featured in a Halloween episode as the Amazing Alonzo, who almost makes his fiancée (Joan Blondell) disappear for real when he keeps their engagement a secret from admiring female passengers. June Allyson stars as a woman losing her eyesight, with Van Johnson as her over-protective husband. Robert Reed is a man who witnessed a shooting but is afraid to testify, with Toni Tennille as a woman with a personal stake in the case. And Jill Whelan is introduced as Vicki, the young daughter of Capt. Stubing's lost love. On the lighter side, we have Billy Crystal as a shy young man by day, masked kissing bandit by night, Soupy Sales and Jo Anne Worley, as a buttoned-up boss and his adoring secretary who awaken after a drunken party in the honeymoon suite, and John Astin as a hermit who maroons Captain Stubing (Gavin McLeod) and company on his deserted island.
isn't Shakespeare, but the writers must have brushed up on classic films to pay homage to the Marx Brothers'
stateroom scene (ship's engineer Larry Storch's large Italian family is smuggled aboard so he can celebrate Thanksgiving with him) and
(Loretta Switt stars as a humorless Russian who gets an extreme makeover). In these tumultuous times,

remains the quintessential "Stop the World" series that allows viewers too forget their troubles. So when goofball Gopher (Fred Grandy) dons women's clothing to protect cruise director Julie (Lauren Tewes) from an overeager passenger (Red Buttons), your blissful smile is
